title: Ayurvedic Consultation Services - Guided Meditation
description: Explore the intuitive power of meditation in this guided session with Dr. Raichur. Through a comprehensive understanding of your current lifestyle and goals, this meditation session will give you the guidance to unlock your inner capacity to heal, love, and transform.
cleaned_text: Guided Meditation Explore the intuitive power of meditation in this guided session with Dr. Raichur. Through a comprehensive understanding of your current lifestyle and goals, this customized tutorial will offer tools to: Create your meditative space Build your practice into an everyday ritual Use pranayama and mantras to both open and quiet your mind This session will give you the guidance to unlock your inner capacity to heal, love, and transform. [Book Now](https://pratima.simplybook.me/v2/#book/count/1/provider/1/) Explore More Ayurvedic Consultation Services with Dr. Pratima Raichur Receive a complimentary copy of Absolute Beauty Further your journey of Ayurvedic wellness and beauty with a signed copy of Dr. Raichur's best-selling book, included with your first Ayurvedic Consultation. [Reserve your Appointment](https://pratima.simplybook.me/v2/#book) Your personalized consultation What to Expect An Ayurvedic Consultation with Dr. Pratima Raichur is a carefully guided wellness path with holistic health resources, individualized support, and ongoing recommendations to help you achieve your goals. [Learn more](/pages/what-to-expect-ayurvedic-consultations) Have a Question? We're here to help! Please let us know how we can best assist you, and a member of our team will reach out to you shortly. You can also reach us via email
